reviewText: I saw the entire 4 seasons both when it first aired and I own the collection. From the Lich assassin which reminds me of Dr. Phibes but he is my favorite character of the show to Stanley which I hated - his constant whine just got under my skin. The robot I didn't care for but fans of Hitchhiker may like him. The sex kitten I liked but found her to be a bit of a bully. I loved the sets, But mostly what I loved was the journeys. I got a kick out of the music. The show is not always pretty and it can be a bit redundant at times. But love it or hate it. I bet you haven't seen anything like it. But Red Dwarf has the same type of humor.
summary: Lexx is a puzzle: at times good and at times bad: It takes some getting use to.
